daily_activities: Morning: Hiking at Mount Batur to watch the sunrise
Afternoon: Visit the Bali Museum to learn about the island's history and culture
Evening: Explore the nightlife in Kuta, with a visit to the famous Sky Garden Club
Morning: Adventure sports - surfing or paddleboarding in Nusa Dua
Afternoon: Shopping at the Ubud Art Market for local handicrafts and souvenirs
Evening: Dining at a traditional Balinese restaurant, with a performance of local dance
Morning: Sightseeing at the Tirta Empul Temple and the Tegalalang rice fields
Afternoon: Visit the Agung Rai Museum of Art to see a collection of Balinese and Indonesian art
Evening: Nightlife in Seminyak, with a visit to the popular Ku De Ta bar
Morning: Hiking in the West Bali National Park to see the island's unique wildlife
Afternoon: Shopping in the trendy boutiques and cafes of Canggu
Evening: Dining at a beachfront restaurant in Jimbaran, with a seafood BBQ
Morning: Adventure sports - white-water rafting or canyoneering in the Ayung River
Afternoon: Sightseeing at the Uluwatu Temple, with a stunning view of the Indian Ocean
Evening: Nightlife in Legian, with a visit to the popular Beach House bar

travel_instructions.estimated_travel_time: Approximately 8 hours and 30 minutes to 10 hours, depending on the route and layovers
travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight to Bali's Ngurah Rai International Airport (DPS) with possible layovers in cities like Mumbai, Delhi, or Singapore. Airlines such as Garuda Indonesia, Singapore Airlines, and Malaysia Airlines operate flights on this route.
